alert.note: Alert for Culpeper; Prince William, Manassas, Manassas Park; Southern Fauquier; Spotsylvania; Stafford (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 1:42AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT STAFFORD...SOUTHEASTERN FAUQUIER... SOUTHEASTERN CULPEPER...SOUTH CENTRAL PRINCE WILLIAM AND NORTHEASTERN SPOTSYLVANIA COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF FREDERICKSBURG... At 139 AM EST, snow showers were located over the area, moving east at 20 mph. Locations impacted include... Stafford, Fredericksburg, Quantico, Aquia Creek, Triangle, Bealeton, Falmouth, Remington, Midland, Stones Corner, Roseville, Garrisonville, Ramoth, Heflin, Dunavant, White Oak, Morrisville, Ruby, Somerville and Goldvein. Snow showers will cause brief reductions in visibility to around one mile at times. Snow may coat the ground in a few spots, and slippery spots are possible on untreated surfaces. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Culpeper; Prince William, Manassas, Manassas Park; Southern Fauquier; Spotsylvania; Stafford
